docs.snippet: U.S. President Donald Trump on Tuesday ordered an end to special legal status for certain immigrants from Liberia, including some who have lived in the United States for decades, citing improved conditions in the West African country.

headline.print_headline: Trump to End Special Status for Liberian Immigrants in U.S.
headline.main: Trump to End Special Status for Liberian Immigrants in U.S.

docs.snippet: In years of dealing with North Korea, I have learned that the regime never gives anything away for free.

headline.print_headline: The Cost of Peace With North Korea
headline.main: What Will Trump Give Up for Peace with North Korea?

docs.snippet: President Donald Trump's pick of John Bolton for his next national security adviser stirred up a burning question in Washington and in foreign capitals: Just how much will his hawkish approach rub off on Trump?

headline.print_headline: Will John Bolton's Hawkish Views Rub Off on Trump?
headline.main: Will John Bolton's Hawkish Views Rub Off on Trump?

docs.snippet: Elliott Broidy, a top Republican fundraiser, sued Qatar on Monday, accusing the Gulf state of pilfering and leaking emails in retribution for his attempts to influence the Trump administration in favor of regional rivals of Qatar.

headline.print_headline: Trump Fundraiser Sues Qatar Over Hacked Emails
headline.main: Trump Fundraiser Sues Qatar Over Hacked Emails

docs.snippet: President Donald Trump on Monday nominated Rebecca Slaughter, chief counsel to Senate Minority Leader Chuck Schumer, to the Federal Trade Commission, the White House said in a statement.

headline.print_headline: Trump Nominates Schumer Aide to Federal Trade Commission
headline.main: Trump Nominates Schumer Aide to Federal Trade Commission

docs.snippet: Writers condemn a federal suit against California and defend the mayor of a sanctuary city.
A statue of a naked Donald Trump is going on the auction block.

headline.print_headline: Naked Donald Trump Statue Going Up for Auction
headline.main: Naked Donald Trump Statue Going Up for Auction

docs.snippet: The new National Economic Council director could help the president sell his agenda, but critics say he could be blinded to bad economic news.

headline.print_headline: New Economic Adviser Is Polished Evangelist Of Supply-Side Theory
headline.main: In Larry Kudlow, Trump Finds His Economic Evangelist

docs.snippet: A special House election in western Pennsylvania ended the night too close to call, with Conor Lamb, a Democrat, and Rick Saccone, a Republican, separated by a few hundred votes.

headline.print_headline: House Race in Trump Territory Is Too Close to Call
headline.main: No Result Yet in Pennsylvania House Race, but Democrat Declares Victory

docs.snippet: Idaho is not the most obvious place to attract members of the Russian punk collective Pussy Riot.

headline.print_headline: Pussy Riot Targets Trump in Republican Stronghold of Idaho
headline.main: Pussy Riot Targets Trump in Republican Stronghold of Idaho
